SELECT E.EMP_ID, M.USER_NAME, J.JOB_NAME, R.RIGHT_NAME, D.DEPT_NAME, E.SAL_LEVEL, E.HIRE_DATE, E.MODIFIY_DATE, E.END_DATE FROM EMPLOYEE E JOIN MEMBER M ON M.EMP_ID = E.EMP_ID JOIN JOB J ON J.JOB_CODE = E.JOB_CODE JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON D.DEPT_CODE = E.DEPT_CODE JOIN RIGHT R ON R.RIGHT_NO = E.RIGHT_NO ORDER BY EMP_ID DESC
